rules_text: Whenever a basic land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Seeker of New Horizons. If you control seven or more lands, bless that land. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 4/4 Dryad creature with reach, vigilance, and haste. It’s still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return it to its owner’s hand.
